languages.text: A marvellous compact weapon in the form of a ring that allows the wearer to fire a {g|f:c23c91c1dd3f45aa86bhttps://owlcat-games.peopleforce.io/employees/194917/performancea38a9478823b4}Plasma Shot{/g} once per combat.

traits.locale_text:
A ring weapon that fires a single plasma shot.
Can only be used once per combat.
